questionsData.title: Ice melts into water.
Vaccination is using a very weak form of a disease to prevent a disease.
Orbit is the path of a planet or moon.
A cat is covered in scales.
A hill is smaller than a mountain.
A tractor is a kind of vehicle used by a farmer.
Peak is the lowest part of a mountain.
A microwave is used to make cooking time longer.
"watch carefully" means "observe".
"swept away" means "moved quickly".
We use thermometer to measure distances.
"filled jobs" and "salaries" are synonyms.
To fail is to be unsuccessful.
"sincerely" comes at the beginning of the letter.
Unnecessary information is used when filling up an application form.
Cook the dates in order to eat them.
Oil is a kind of liquid that is used in cooking.
"departure" and "arrival" are antonyms.
Boats and ships are the same size .
"sudden fear" means "visibility"
The text is mainly talking about ……
questionsData.article:
Plastic is a material we use every day. We are using (it 1) so fast that the earth's supplies may run out.
Because of this, scientists are investigating new ideas for making plastic from plants, such as sweet potato,
bamboo and flax. Things made of plastic can be useful but bad for the planet. Some plastics can last for a long
time without wearing out and can be (difficult 2) to get rid of when they are not needed. Recycling is a good way
to get rid of unwanted products. This can be difficult as different (types 3) of plastic need to be recycled in
different ways. Some kinds of plastics can be melted down and used to make things such as bags and bottles.
Others can be made into fibers for clothing. The environment is in danger because of plastic, so another way to
protect the environment is to use canvas bags for shopping rather than plastic ones
